typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as short,
		MONTH as short,
		DAY as short,
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE as short,
		SCHEDULED_TIME as short,
		DISTANCE as short,
		SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL as short,
		{late-flight} as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/flights5K/*']) ~> source
source sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['temp/juink.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
